text: use both this parameter and |birth_date to display the person's date of birth, date of death, and age at death) --> | death_place = | death_cause = | body_discovered = | resting_place = | resting_place_coordinates = | burial_place = | burial_coordinates = | monuments = | nationality = Brazilian | other_names = | siglum = | citizenship = | education = | alma_mater = | occupation = Actress, Model | years_active = | era = | employer = | organization = | agent = | known_for = | notable_works = | style = | net_worth = | height = 170 cm | television = | title = | term = | predecessor = | successor = | party = | movement = | opponents = | boards = | criminal_charges = | criminal_penalty = | criminal_status = | spouse = | partner = Neymar (2013-2018) | children = | parents = | mother = | father = | relatives = | family = | callsign = | awards = Full list | website = | module = | module2 = | module3 = | module4 = | module5 = | module6 = | signature = | signature_size = | signature_alt = | footnotes = }} Bruna Reis Maia (born 4 August 1995), known professionally as Bruna Marquezine, is a Brazilian actress. She is known for her roles in the telenovelas Mulheres Apaixonadas, América, Salve Jorge, I Love Paraisópolis and Deus Salve o Rei. She will play Jenny Kord in the upcoming 2023 DCEU movie Blue Beetle. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian voice actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro Category:People from Duque de Caxias
